DataElement.preferredName: TP53 Gene Mutation Load Assessment Quantitation Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The assessment of the load of TP53 Mutations.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: This gene plays a critical role in cell cycle regulation and has tumor suppressor activity._The reduction in the average fitness of an individual or a population resulting from accumulated deleterious mutations._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: This gene plays a critical role in cell cycle regulation and has tumor suppressor activity.:The reduction in the average fitness of an individual or a population resulting from accumulated deleterious mutations.

Concepts.definition: This gene plays a critical role in cell cycle regulation and has tumor suppressor activity.
The reduction in the average fitness of an individual or a population resulting from accumulated deleterious mutations.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position (locus) on a particular chromosome, is capable of reproducing itself exactly at each cell division, and directs the formation of a protein or other product. The gene as a functional unit consists of a discrete segment of a giant DNA molecule containing the purine (adenine and guanine) and pyrimidine (cytosine and thymine) bases in the ordered and correct sequence that encodes a specific functional product (i.e., a protein or RNA molecule).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function._The reduction in the average fitness of an individual or a population resulting from accumulated deleterious mutations._The act of measuring or estimating a quantity._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
